job_description:
• Highly proficient SQL skills: proficient in writing complex SQL queries to extract, manipulate, and analyze dataAdvanced data exploration and analysis skillsFamiliarity with marketing practices, marketing KPIs, marketing analyticsHighly proficient in Excel / Google Sheets Passion for data, and analysis.
• Comfortable working with large datasetsStrong problem-solving skillsHighly proficient in Tableau desktop or similar data visualization tool (ability to perform complex calculations, parameters, LOD expressions, etc)Ability to derive actionable insights from data and effectively guide decision-making, communicating in a comprehensible way across various levels of our organizationExperienced with data storytelling using tools such as Google Slides or PowerPoint.
• Excellent written and oral communication skillsDetail-oriented with strong time management and project prioritization skills, operating in an unstructured environmentComfortable taking the initiative to develop solutions for unstructured problems and communicate the results to key internal customersExperience working with cross-functional teams and stakeholders Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Our Story Newsroom Blog Careers Trust Salesforce.
• Org Sustainability Investors Give us your Feedback Sitemap Legal Terms of Service Privacy Information Responsible Disclosure Trust Contact Manage Preferences Data Build Tool (dbt) experience a plusMarketing and/or Sales Strategy Analytics experience a plusEnterprise (B2B) marketing experience a plusSalesforce experience and product knowledge a plusSalesforce and Tableau certification a plusExperience with Python a plus BS/BA degree in marketing, economics, marketing, finance, business analytics, business, or equivalent related experience2+ years of analytics experience (Marketing Analytics or Sales Strategy preferred) University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Contribute to development of custom reporting frameworks to incorporate new data inputs, including new products and calculated metrics.
• Contribute to the development and maintenance of Marketing’s measurement strategy and roadmap, identifying the correct key, leading, and diagnostic metrics for profitable growth.
• Build on and document our data sources, models, metrics, and dashboards in a way that increases our team’s long-term efficiency and output.
• Enable and train marketing teams to become confident consumers of dashboards and other components of our data products.

• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.
• A global technology and professional services company that delivers consulting, technology and mission services to every major agency across the U.
• Government, defense and intelligence community.
• Our 30,000 experts extract the power of technology to create immediate value and deliver solutions at the edge of innovation.
• We operate across 30 countries worldwide, offering leading capabilities in digital modernization, AI/ML, Cloud, Cyber and application development.
• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.
